name: Quotation Request Template
response:
Dear {{ doc.supplier_name }},


We are pleased to invite you to submit a quotation for the following items:



Please submit your quotation by {{ doc.due_date }}.


Thank you!


Best regards,

{{ doc.company }}
response_html:
Dear Sir/Madam

IntelliSOFT Consulting Limited hereby solicits a quotation for the following item(s): This Request for Quotation is open to all legally-constituted companies & individuals that can provide the requested services.

GENERAL TERMS AND CONDITIONS

IntelliSOFT Consulting Limited is a wholly owned Kenyan company with +15 years of experience. We have and continue to deliberately focus on designing, developing, implementing, supporting and maintaining digital health solutions, particularly for Low to Medium Income Countries.
We work with our clients to support the realization and optimization of their business performance and productivity through development, implementation and supporting meaningful use of information, communications and technology-agnostic, web-optimized software, particularly for low-resourced environments. Our primary focus is health systems’ strengthening specifically in the area of Health Research Support Information Systems and Health Management Information Systems.

Questions

Questions or requests for further clarifications should be submitted in writing to the contact person below:

Email Subject: DEV_RFQ_May 2024 ....
Email Address: IntelliSOFT Accounts

The deadline for submission is Friday, 24th May 2024 2:00 PM EAT.
Questions will be answered in writing and shared via email with all parties as soon as possible after this deadline.

  1. Content for Submission

    Quotations should be submitted in a single file where possible, depending on file size. The vendor must fill in and submit the Vendor RFQ submission form (See Appendix Section A) that comprises following sections: Vendor Information Form Submission of Quotation Form

  2. Instructions for submission

    The Vendor RFQ submission Form & Submission of Quotation Form (See Appendix Section A) should be uploaded as instructed in this submission Form. Based on the guidelines set forth in Section III above, quotations have to be sent by completing this submission Form no later than Friday, 23rd, August 2024 by 2:00 PM EAT.

  3. Overview of Evaluation Process

    Quotations will be evaluated based on compliance with the technical specifications and the total cost of the goods (price quote).

  4. AWard

    IntelliSOFT shall award a Purchase Order to the lowest-priced bidder whose quotation has been determined to be substantially compliant with the documents requested. If your offer is selected we may ask you to submit additional documents to be sent to our QA Team for approval like: product links/sites of your work.

  5. Right to Vary Requirements

    IntelliSOFT reserves the right at the time of award of Contract to increase or decrease the quantity/number of items specified in this RFQ without any change in unit prices or other terms and conditions.

  6. Payment Terms

    IntelliSOFT’s default payment terms are payment upon delivery of goods and receipt of a tax invoice describing the goods delivered.

  7. Fraud and Corruption

    IntelliSOFT is committed to preventing, identifying, and addressing all acts of fraud against IntelliSOFT, as well as against third parties involved in IntelliSOFT’s activities.

  8. Zero Tolerance

    IntelliSOFT has adopted a zero-tolerance policy on gifts and hospitality. Suppliers are therefore requested not to send gifts or offer hospitality to IntelliSOFT personnel.

  9. Warranty

    Warranty shall be quoted based on the standard warranties provided by the manufacturer unless specified differently in this General Instruction. A Warranty Certificate shall be provided by the Supplier.

Submit Quotation {{ portal_link }}
subject: Quotation Request Template

Exit Questionnaire
